alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 08 at 3:57PM EDT until April 08 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT TODAY FOR THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE AND PORTIONS OF SOUTHWEST ALABAMA AND SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS OF 15 TO 20 MPH, AND DRY FUELS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT LATE SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH ERC VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH, AND HIGH ERC VALUES... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH, AND HIGH ERC VALUES... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 7 PM CDT this evening. A Fire Weather Watch remains in effect from 10 AM Saturday morning to 6 PM CDT Saturday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 201, 202, 203, 204, 205 and 206. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 19 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
